name: St. Kizito

locations.description: Youngest of the Ugandan Martyrs, martyred at Namugongo

summary: Kizito was the youngest of the Ugandan Martyrs, only 14 years old when he was martyred. He was a page in the court of King Mwanga II of Buganda and was burned alive at Namugongo along with Charles Lwanga and other companions for refusing to renounce his Christian faith. Kizito is the patron saint of children and primary schools in Uganda.
